snippet: Officials from the Australian Baseball League said that they hope local interest in the sport will grow with the support of Major League Baseball, which has a 75 percent ownership stake.
abstract: Baseball is minority sport in Australia, but Major League Baseball--which took 75 percent ownership stake in Australian Baseball League in 2010--is trying to change that; plans for game-of-the-week to be shown on television are in works and $1.5 billion stadium is rising in Perth.
lead_paragraph: Officials from the Australian Baseball League said that they hope local interest in the sport will grow with the support of Major League Baseball, which has a 75 percent ownership stake.

headline.main: It’s Not Cricket, but It’s a Ballgame in Australia
headline.print_headline: It’s Not Cricket, but It’s a Ballgame
